location.description: City name in English (e.g., Tokyo, Osaka, New York, Paris)

date.description: Target dates for weather forecast. Can specify multiple dates to get forecasts for several days at once.

detail.description: Level of detail in response. 'basic': temperature and condition only. 'detailed': adds humidity, wind, rain chance, feels-like temperature. 'full': adds UV index, pressure, visibility, cloud cover, sunrise/sunset.

hourly.description: If true, includes 3-hourly forecast breakdown (8 data points per day). Each data point contains fields according to the 'detail' level. Useful when user asks about specific times like 'afternoon' or 'evening'.
